Allows the player to walk on foliage blocks.
passablefoliage.config.alwaysLeafWalking:
Always consider the player to have the Leaf Walker enchantment.
Once enabled, the recipe of Leaf Walker enchantment will be removed from the game, and the fall damage reduction and speed reduction will be ignored.
passablefoliage.config.alwaysNotViewBloc: Prevents leaves from rendering a texture in front of the player's view
passablefoliage.config.fallDamageReducti: The percentage of normal damage taken when taking damage from falling into leaves
passablefoliage.config.fallDamageThresho: When falling into leaves, the (block) distance a player or mob has to fall before taking damage
passablefoliage.config.modifyPathFinding: Should entities recognize leaves as air
passablefoliage.config.playerOnly.desc: Should only players be able to pass through leaves
passablefoliage.config.sounds.volume.des: The volume of the sound made when moving inside leaves
passablefoliage.config.speedReductionHor: The reduced horizontal speed when passing through leaves. (% of normal)
passablefoliage.config.speedReductionVer: The reduced vertical speed when passing through leaves. (% of normal)
